body_text:
Working on the fix now.  Will push either tonight or by Tuesday.
…
On Wed, Feb 8, 2017 at 11:08 AM, Matt Wytock ***@***.***> wrote:
 I hit this too.

 For others waiting for a fix, monkey patch is a temporary workaround:

 # Workaround for https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7204from tensorflow.python.ops import array_opsfrom tensorflow.python.ops import math_ops
 array_ops.reduce_prod = math_ops.reduce_prod

 —
 You are receiving this because you were assigned.

body:
Working on the fix now.  Will push either tonight or by Tuesday.

On Wed, Feb 8, 2017 at 11:08 AM, Matt Wytock <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> I hit this too.
>
> For others waiting for a fix, monkey patch is a temporary workaround:
>
> # Workaround for https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/7204from tensorflow.python.ops import array_opsfrom tensorflow.python.ops import math_ops
> array_ops.reduce_prod = math_ops.reduce_prod

> —
